project.name: |-- 004-filtering-and-slicing
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + Filtering using Predicates + Filtering unique Elements + Truncating Elements (limit) + Skipping Elements
This project includes very simple examples that illustrate how to perform different operations with streams.
FilteringWithAPredRunner: Illustrates the use of filter() with a predicate.
FilteringUniqueElemsRunner: Illustrates the use of distinct() to filter unique elements.
TruncatingAStreamRunner: Illustrates the use of limit() to truncate a stream.
SkippingElemsRunner: Illustrates the use of skip() to discard the first elements from a stream.
